# NSImageRepMatchesDevice

**Global Variable**

A constant indicating that the value of certain attributes, such as the number of colors or bits per sample, will change to match the display device.

## Declaration

```swift
var NSImageRepMatchesDevice: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This value can be passed in (or received back) as the value of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImageRep/bitsPerSample], [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImageRep/pixelsWide], and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImageRep/pixelsHigh].
title: NSImageRepMatchesDevice
